name: The Knight of the Crimson Tower
name_original: The Knight of the Crimson Tower
description:
What could be more desirable than freedom if you dwell in a cage? Some are lucky enough to have Prince Charming to save them, but some have to take everything in their own hands — and then the Knight emerges, the Knight ready to fight the Horror.

The Knight of the Crimson Tower is a kinetic visual novel about the adventures of Laura, a daughter of a noble lord and a host for a mysterious curse — or maybe a blessing? It is a story of how you make mistakes and fix them, about the hunters, the hunted, confrontations and revelations.

What lies ahead:

  • spoilt but kind-hearted lass to play as;
  • a mix between horror and hentai;
  • first glance at the mirror universe;
  • quite a few hidden treasures;
  • animated BGs and CGs;
  • gallery, music room and the ability to swap in-game resolution for the best experience.
